summary.raw: fix error in calculation position of the coupling relative to the spout
summary.html: fix error in calculation position of the coupling relative to the spout

values.message: fix error in calculation position of the coupling relative to the spout

summary.raw: fix for issue #316.  By shifting alignment position error check point on the coupling towards the spout, this should make insertion criteria easier.  I.e. we were originally checking alignment of the coupling link origin's x and y location to be within a small region relative to the spout link origin, but a better place to check is the center of the coupling collision cylinder surface towards the spout.
summary.html: fix for issue #316. By shifting alignment position error check point on the coupling towards the spout, this should make insertion criteria easier. I.e. we were originally checking alignment of the coupling link origin's x and y location to be within a small region relative to the spout link origin, but a better place to check is the center of the coupling collision cylinder surface towards the spout.

values.message: fix for issue #316.  By shifting alignment position error check point on the coupling towards the spout, this should make insertion criteria easier.  I.e. we were originally checking alignment of the coupling link origin's x and y location to be within a small region relative to the spout link origin, but a better place to check is the center of the coupling collision cylinder surface towards the spout.
